## Multiwrap class

Multiwrap lets you wrap arbitrary ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155 tokens you own into a single wrapped token / NFT.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Multiwrap extends Erc721<MultiwrapContract> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Erc721](./sdk.erc721.md)<!-- -->&lt;MultiwrapContract

## Example


```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK("rinkeby");
const contract = sdk.getMultiwrap("{{contract_address}}");
```
